LanguageData.Vanya_ShieldBelt.label: Vanya Shield Belt
LanguageData.Vanya_ShieldBelt.description: A single-person energy shield device. It will attempt to stop any rapidly-moving projectile or energy attack that comes from a distance. It does nothing against melee attacks or shots from point-blank range. It also prevents firing past touch range.
LanguageData.Vanya_ShieldBelt_MKII.label: Vanya Shield Belt MKII
LanguageData.Vanya_ShieldBelt_MKII.description: A single-person energy shield device. It will attempt to stop any rapidly-moving projectile or energy attack that comes from a distance. It does nothing against melee attacks or shots from point-blank range. It also prevents firing past touch range.
